item.title: A Prayer for Boldness
item.description: Sometimes fear and worry can make us cower when we should be standing tall. As we end this year, let's say what God says so that we may boldly step into tomorrow. Lord thank You for Your promises that free me from the fruitless task of worry. Matthew 6:31-34, Matthew 6:27 Your Word implores me to be bold and courageousâ€”and to resist fear and impatience. Psalm 27:14 Lord, my belief in You has the power to move mountains in my life.
